Note: For closely related lines see 2377, 5009, and 6610.
_description: The Bitterness of Death — twelve lines, mainly in couplets

BLHar7322.First Lines: Strong it hus to flitteFro worldes blisse to pitte…
BLHar7322.Note: Written to right of Latin prose text as if a second column, introduced by the Latin “Anglice.” Followed without break by 5216.
